table.name: caom2.Observation
table.description: the main CAOM Observation table

column.name: collection
column.description: data collection this observation belongs to

column.name: algorithm_name
column.description: algorithm that defines the observation( exposure for simple, grouping algorithm for composites)

column.name: type
column.description: type of data collected (e.g. FITS OBSTYPE header)

column.name: intent
column.description: intended purpose of data (one of: science, calibration)

column.name: sequenceNumber
column.description: sequence number assigned by the observatory

column.name: metaRelease
column.description: date the metadata for an observation is public (UTC)

column.name: targetPosition_equinox
column.description: equinox of target position coordinate system

column.name: telescope_name
column.description: name of telescope used to acquire observation

column.name: telescope_geoLocationX
column.description: x component of geocentric location of telescope

column.name: telescope_geoLocationY
column.description: y component of geocentric location of telescope

column.name: telescope_geoLocationZ
column.description: z component of geocentric location of telescope

column.name: requirements_flag
column.description: flag describing satisfied proposal requirements (possible values: fail)

column.name: instrument_name
column.description: name of instrument used to acquire observation

column.name: environment_wavelengthTau
column.description: wavelength at which Tau has been measured

column.name: members
column.description: members of a composite observation (space-separated list of Observation URIs)

column.name: typeCode
column.description: single character code to denote type: S(impleObservation) or C(ompositeOvservation)

column.name: lastModified
column.description: timestamp of last modification of this row

column.name: maxLastModified
column.description: timestamp of last modification of this observation

column.name: metaChecksum
column.description: checksum of the metadata in this entity (URI of the form <algorithm>:<value>)

column.name: accMetaChecksum
column.description: checksum of the metadata in this entity+children (URI of the form <algorithm>:<value>)

foreignKey.description: standard way to join caom2.Observation (CompositeObservation) and caom2.ObservationMember [join table]

table.name: caom2.Plane
table.description: the products of the observation

column.name: planeURI
column.description: unique internal URI for this product

column.name: publisherID
column.description: unique global identifier for this product

column.name: metaRelease
column.description: date the metadata for a plane is public (UTC)

column.name: dataRelease
column.description: date the data for a plane is public (UTC)

column.name: provenance_name
column.description: name of the process that created this plane

column.name: provenance_lastExecuted
column.description: date this process was last executed

column.name: provenance_inputs
column.description: inputs of the process that created this plane (space-separated list of Plane URIs)

column.name: metrics_fluxDensityLimit
column.description: flux density limit where S:N=5 for point source

column.name: metrics_magLimit
column.description: AB magnitude limit where S:N=5 for point source

column.name: quality_flag
column.description: flag describing the data quality (possible values: junk)

column.name: position_bounds_size
column.description: size of the polygon bounds (diameter of minimum spanning circle)

column.name: position_sampleSize
column.description: median sample (pixel) size on spatial axes

column.name: position_dimension_naxis1
column.description: dimensions (number of pixels) along one spatial axis

column.name: position_dimension_naxis2
column.description: dimensions (number of pixels) along other spatial axis

column.name: position_timeDependent
column.description: flag indicating that the position is time-dependent (0=false, 1=true)

column.name: energy_bounds_lower
column.description: lower bound on energy axis (barycentric wavelength)

column.name: energy_bounds_upper
column.description: upper bound on energy axis (barycentric wavelength)

column.name: energy_dimension
column.description: dimension (number of pixels) along energy axis

column.name: energy_sampleSize
column.description: median sample (pixel) size on energy axis

column.name: energy_bandpassName
column.description: collection-specific name for energy band (e.g. filter name)

column.name: energy_freqWidth
column.description: width of the energy bounds (convenience: in frequency)

column.name: energy_freqSampleSize
column.description: median sample (pixel) size on energy axis (convenience: in frequency)

column.name: energy_restwav
column.description: rest wavelength of target spectral feature (barycentric)

column.name: time_bounds_lower
column.description: lower bound on time axis (Modified Julian Day)

column.name: time_bounds_upper
column.description: upper bound on time axis (Modified Julian Day)

column.name: time_dimension
column.description: dimension (number of pixels) along time axis

column.name: time_resolution
column.description: median resolution on the time axis

column.name: time_sampleSize
column.description: median sample (pixel) size on time axis

column.name: polarization_states
column.description: polarization letter codes in canonical order, separated by /

column.name: polarization_dimension
column.description: number of samples (pixels) along polarization axis

column.name: lastModified
column.description: timestamp of last modification of this row

column.name: metaChecksum
column.description: checksum of the metadata in this entity (URI of the form <algorithm>:<value>)

column.name: accMetaChecksum
column.description: checksum of the metadata in this entity+children (URI of the form <algorithm>:<value>)

foreignKey.description: standard way to join caom2.Plane (product) and caom2.ProvenanceInput [join table]
standard way to join the caom2.Observation and caom2.Plane tables

table.name: caom2.Artifact
table.description: physical data artifacts (e.g. files)

column.name: uri
column.description: external URI for the physical artifact

column.name: productType
column.description: product type (science, calibration, auxiliary, preview, info)

column.name: releaseType
column.description: release type (data, meta), new: not in use

column.name: contentType
column.description: content-type of the representation at uri

column.name: contentLength
column.description: size of the representation at uri

column.name: contentChecksum
column.description: checksum of the content (URI of the form <algorithm>:<value>)

column.name: accessURL
column.description: access URL for the complete file

column.name: lastModified
column.description: timestamp of last modification of this row

column.name: metaChecksum
column.description: checksum of the metadata in this entity (URI of the form <algorithm>:<value>)

column.name: accMetaChecksum
column.description: checksum of the metadata in this entity+children (URI of the form <algorithm>:<value>)

foreignKey.description: standard way to join the caom2.Plane and caom2.Artifact tables

table.name: caom2.Part
table.description: parts of artifacts (e.g. FITS extensions)

column.name: productType
column.description: product type (science, calibration, auxiliary, preview, info)

column.name: lastModified
column.description: timestamp of last modification of this row

column.name: metaChecksum
column.description: checksum of the metadata in this entity (URI of the form <algorithm>:<value>)

column.name: accMetaChecksum
column.description: checksum of the metadata in this entity+children (URI of the form <algorithm>:<value>)

foreignKey.description: standard way to join the caom2.Artifact and caom2.Part tables

table.name: caom2.Chunk
table.description: description of the data array in a part

column.name: naxis
column.description: size of the representation at uri

column.name: positionAxis1
column.description: axis for the first position coordinate

column.name: positionAxis2
column.description: axis for the second position coordinate

column.name: position_axis_axis1_ctype
column.description: coordinate type for first position axis

column.name: position_axis_axis1_cunit
column.description: coordinate unit for first position axis

column.name: position_axis_error1_syser
column.description: systematic coordinate error for first position axis

column.name: position_axis_error1_rnder
column.description: random coordinate error for first position axis

column.name: position_axis_axis2_ctype
column.description: coordinate type for second position axis

column.name: position_axis_axis2_cunit
column.description: coordinate unit for second position axis

column.name: position_axis_error2_syser
column.description: systematic coordinate error for second position axis

column.name: position_axis_error2_rnder
column.description: random coordinate error for second position axis

column.name: energy_axis_error_syser
column.description: systematic coordinate error for energy axis

column.name: energy_axis_error_rnder
column.description: random coordinate error for energy axis

column.name: energy_bandpassName
column.description: observatory name for the band (e.g. filter name)

column.name: time_axis_error_syser
column.description: systematic coordinate error for time axis

column.name: time_axis_error_rnder
column.description: random coordinate error for time axis

column.name: polarization_axis_error_syser
column.description: systematic coordinate error for polarization axis

column.name: polarization_axis_error_rnder
column.description: random coordinate error for polarization axis

column.name: lastModified
column.description: timestamp of last modification of this row

column.name: metaChecksum
column.description: checksum of the metadata in this entity (URI of the form <algorithm>:<value>)

column.name: accMetaChecksum
column.description: checksum of the metadata in this entity+children (URI of the form <algorithm>:<value>)

foreignKey.description: standard way to join the caom2.Part and caom2. tables

table.name: caom2.ObservationMember
table.description: composite to simple observation join table

foreignKey.description: standard way to join caom2.ObservationMember and caom2.Observation (SimpleObservation) [join table]

table.name: caom2.ProvenanceInput
table.description: plane.provenance to input plane join table

foreignKey.description: standard way to join caom2.ProvenanceInput and caom2.Plane (input) [join table]

table.name: caom2.EnumField
table.description: pre-computed aggregate (group by) table built from enumerated types in CAOM model

column.name: num_tuples
column.description: number of occurances of this combination

column.name: max_time_bounds_cval1
column.description: maximum timestamp of observations with this combination

column.name: type
column.description: type of observation (from FITS OBSTYPE keyword)

column.name: intent
column.description: intent of the observation (one of: science, calibration)

column.name: energy_bandpassName
column.description: collection-specific name for energy band (e.g. filter name)

table.name: caom2.ObsCoreEnumField
table.description: pre-computed aggregate (group by) table built from enumerated types in ObsCore-1.1 model

column.name: num_tuples
column.description: number of occurances of this combination

column.name: max_t_min
column.description: maximum timestamp of observations with this combination

table.name: caom2.distinct_proposal_id
table.description: pre-computed list of distinct caom2.Observation.proposal_id values

column.name: num_tuples
column.description: number of occurances of this value

table.name: caom2.distinct_proposal_pi
table.description: pre-computed list of distinct caom2.Observation.proposal_pi values

column.name: num_tuples
column.description: number of occurances of this value

table.name: caom2.distinct_proposal_title
table.description: pre-computed list of distinct caom2.Observation.proposal_title values

column.name: num_tuples
column.description: number of occurances of this value

table.name: caom2.HarvestSkipURI
table.description: list of observations that failed to be harvested

table.name: caom2.SIAv1
table.description: SIAv1 view on CAOM-2.0: caom.Observation JOIN caom.Plane JOIN caom2.Artifact, limited to calibrated science images

column.name: accessURL
column.description: access URL for the complete image

column.name: collection
column.description: data collection this observation belongs to

column.name: dataRelease
column.description: UTC timestamp when data is publicly available

column.name: energy_bandpassName
column.description: collection-specific name for energy band (e.g. filter name)

column.name: energy_bounds_cval1
column.description: lower bound on energy axis (barycentric wavelength)

column.name: energy_bounds_cval2
column.description: upper bound on energy axis (barycentric wavelength)

column.name: instrument_name
column.description: name of the instrument used to collect the data

column.name: metaRelease
column.description: UTC timestamp when metadata is publicly visible

column.name: position_naxis
column.description: dimensions (number of pixels) along spatial axes

column.name: time_bounds_center
column.description: central value on time axis (Modified Julian Day)

column.name: time_bounds_cval1
column.description: lower bound on time axis (Modified Julian Day)

column.name: time_bounds_cval2
column.description: upper bound on time axis (Modified Julian Day)

table.name: ivoa.ObsCore
table.description: ObsCore-1.1 observation table

column.name: obs_collection
column.description: short name for the data colection

column.name: obs_release_date
column.description: timestamp of date the data becomes publicly available

column.name: s_fov
column.description: size of the region covered (~diameter of minimum bounding circle)

column.name: s_xel1
column.description: dimensions (number of pixels) along one spatial axis

column.name: s_xel2
column.description: dimensions (number of pixels) along the other spatial axis

column.name: t_xel
column.description: dimensions (number of pixels) along the time axis

column.name: em_xel
column.description: dimensions (number of pixels) along the energy axis

column.name: pol_states
column.description: polarization states present in the data

column.name: pol_xel
column.description: dimensions (number of pixels) along the polarization axis

column.name: o_ucd
column.description: UCD describing the observable axis (pixel values)

column.name: lastModified
column.description: timestamp of last modification of the metadata

table.name: ivoa.ObsFile
table.description: ObsCore-1.x file table

column.name: last_modified
column.description: timestamp of last modification of the metadata

foreignKey.description: standard way to join the ivoa.ObsCore and ivoa.ObsFile tables

table.name: ivoa.ObsPart
table.description: ObsCore-1.x part table

column.name: name
column.description: name of this part (e.g. FITS extension name or number)

column.name: naxis
column.description: size of the representation at uri

column.name: s_axis1
column.description: axis for the first position coordinate

column.name: s_axis2
column.description: axis for the second position coordinate

column.name: s_ctype1
column.description: coordinate type for first position axis

column.name: s_ctype2
column.description: coordinate type for second position axis

column.name: s_cunit1
column.description: coordinate unit for first position axis

column.name: s_cunit2
column.description: coordinate unit for second position axis

column.name: s_syser1
column.description: systematic coordinate error for first position axis

column.name: s_syser2
column.description: systematic coordinate error for second position axis

column.name: s_rnder1
column.description: random coordinate error for first position axis

column.name: s_rnder2
column.description: random coordinate error for second position axis

column.name: s_naxis1
column.description: number of pixels on first position axis

column.name: s_naxis2
column.description: number of pixels on second for position axis

column.name: s_crpix1
column.description: reference pixel on first position axis

column.name: s_crpix2
column.description: reference pixel on second position axis

column.name: s_crval1
column.description: reference value on first position axis

column.name: s_crval2
column.description: reference value on second position axis

column.name: em_syser
column.description: systematic coordinate error for energy axis

column.name: em_rnder
column.description: random coordinate error for energy axis

column.name: em_naxis
column.description: number of pixels on energy axis

column.name: t_syser
column.description: systematic coordinate error for time axis

column.name: t_rnder
column.description: random coordinate error for time axis

column.name: t_naxis
column.description: number of pixels on time axis

column.name: p_syser
column.description: systematic coordinate error for polarization axis

column.name: p_rnder
column.description: random coordinate error for polarization axis

column.name: p_naxis
column.description: number of pixels on polarization axis

column.name: last_modified
column.description: timestamp of last modification of the metadata

foreignKey.description: standard way to join the ivoa.ObsFile and ivoa.ObsPart tables

table.name: tap_schema.schemas
table.description: description of schemas in this tableset

column.name: schema_name
column.description: schema name for reference to tap_schema.schemas

column.name: utype
column.description: lists the utypes of schemas in the tableset

column.name: schema_index
column.description: recommended sort order when listing schemas

table.name: tap_schema.tables
table.description: description of tables in this tableset

column.name: schema_name
column.description: the schema this table belongs to

column.name: utype
column.description: lists the utype of tables in the tableset

column.name: table_index
column.description: recommended sort order when listing tables

table.name: tap_schema.columns
table.description: description of columns in this tableset

column.name: table_name
column.description: the table this column belongs to

column.name: utype
column.description: lists the utypes of columns in the tableset

column.name: ucd
column.description: lists the UCDs of columns in the tableset

column.name: unit
column.description: lists the unit used for column values in the tableset

column.name: description
column.description: describes the columns in the tableset

column.name: datatype
column.description: lists the ADQL datatype of columns in the tableset

column.name: xtype
column.description: a DALI or custom extended type annotation

column.name: arraysize
column.description: lists the size of variable-length columns in the tableset

column.name: column_index
column.description: recommended sort order when listing columns of a table

table.name: tap_schema.keys
table.description: description of foreign keys in this tableset

column.name: key_id
column.description: unique key to join to tap_schema.key_columns

column.name: from_table
column.description: the table with the foreign key

column.name: target_table
column.description: the table with the primary key

column.name: utype
column.description: lists the utype of keys in the tableset

table.name: tap_schema.key_columns
table.description: description of foreign key columns in this tableset
